cloud my name is carsten PS I'm the vice
president of product management at
engine yard engine yard is the pioneer
and leader in platform as a service
which effectively empowers our customers
which are primarily developers to focus
on Innovation a lot of our customers are
web T Auto companies that have great
ideas and want to bring those to Market
but don't necessarily have the resources
especially in their early days to uh
purchase a lot of infrastructure which
is capital intensive and so they come to
engine yard to leverage our expertise
and our platform as a service as a way
to very rapidly get their applications
out up and running in the cloud we
actually started out with our own
Hardware we had our own servers and and
we managed those for our customers but
we found that to do what we needed to do
to innovate in the platform as a service
space we really wanted to focus on that
by using AWS we've really been able to
achieve not only pioneering a new space
but leading a new space in terms of
platform as a service we have companies
like Toyota and Simon and Schuster where
there's a particular Department that has
a particular need for which they don't
have resources they can't really buy
servers and they they need to get
started quickly they need to get
something up and running and then
typically once that happens and they see
the benefits of the flexibility and the
scalability that they get from the cloud
then over time more applications are
moves to the cloud and other departments
start seeing that success and uh and it
begins to spread the benefits that we
get with working with AWS amount to
flexibility scalability and Global reach
uh those are natural things that a
company like ours is looking for when we
have a large footprint of customers
where we're operating in many different
countries and we need to provide a
consistent level of service across all
of those different regions and another
benefit is time to Market we had a
customer that needed to scale their app
10x from one month to the next and with
AWS cloud and engine yard that was
possible another another key benefit
that we've learned over the years is a
continuing pace of innovation and Amazon
web services has really delivered on
that over the years and we we continue
to look forward to the new things that
are coming down the pipe
